\message{Hyphenation patterns for uni-accent (monotonic) Modern Greek}
%
\begingroup
\input pattern-loader.tex
\ifNativeUtfEightPatterns
	\input hyph-el-monoton.tex
\else
\t% we still load old patterns for 8-bit TeX
	\input grmhyph5
\fi
\endgroup
